page.title: 12 LOCAL SHOPPING HABITS
page.content:
People in Sutton go shopping at Bransholme Centre not only people from Sutton but everywhere else. People in Sutton go shopping to a local foodstore which is in Sutton and go to other shops as well. Some of the shops are foodshops and grocery stores.
In Sutton there is a bank a stamp collectors shop, Gateway food store, a Chinese chip shop , a bakery. On the other side of the road there is a newsagent and next door is an off-licence. The people of Sutton and other people use these shops regularly.
By Paula Greenley(12)
